text: Jean-Yves Nau (28 May 1952 – 8 November 2020) was a French physician and scientific journalist. He began working for the newspaper Le Monde in 1980. He wrote for La Revue du practicien, Revue Médicale Suisse, La Nouvelle République du Centre-Ouest. He moved to the French language version of Slate magazine as a columnist. Nau died on 8 November 2020 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French physicians Category:French journalists Category:People from Indre-et-Loire Category:Writers from Centre-Val de Loire
title: Jean-Yves Nau
